Class PatientService

java.lang.Object
com.syncura360.service.PatientService
@Service public class PatientService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing patient information.

  • Method Details

    • createPatient

      public void createPatient(PatientFormDTO patientFormDTO)
      Creates a new patient in the system.
      Parameters:
      patientFormDTO - The data transfer object containing the patient details.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityExistsException - If a patient with the same details already exists.

    • updatePatient

      public void updatePatient(PatientUpdateDTO patientUpdateDTO)
      Updates an existing patient's information.
      Parameters:
      patientUpdateDTO - The data transfer object containing the updated patient details.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityExistsException - If the patient does not exist.
      IllegalArgumentException - If input constraints are violated (e.g., negative height or weight).

    • fetchPatients

      public PatientViewFetchContainer fetchPatients()
      Fetches a list of all patients in the system.
      Returns:
      A PatientViewFetchContainer containing a list of all patients.

    • fetchPatient

      public SpecificPatientFetchDTO fetchPatient(Integer patientId)
      Fetches details of a specific patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      A SpecificPatientFetchDTO containing the details of the patient.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the patient with the given ID does not exist.
